name: EL_FEATURE_REF
documentation: A reference that is scoped by a containing entity and requires a context qualifier if it is not the currently scoping entity.

scoper.name: scoper
scoper.documentation: Scoping expression, which must be a `EL_VALUE_GENERATOR`.

reference.name: reference
reference.documentation: Generated full reference name, consisting of scoping elements and `_name_` concatenated using dot notation.
